Description: Steatite shabti of Chief Lector Padiamunemipet with a lappet-wig, a collar and crossed hands in relief holding a hoe and the cord of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with five rows(surviving) of Hieroglyphic text; the lower leg section is lost.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris
Condition: incomplete - lower leg section lost; damage to surface
